snippet: Myq Kaplan, a stand-up comedian in New York, refines his material at a rate that saw one joke evolve over two months before finally making it onto late-night television.
abstract: Comedian Myq Kaplan refines his stand-up material in performance after performance, finding which variations of jokes work best; joke about chivalry, jackets and puddles was refined at over 80 clubs before being performed on late-night television program Conan.
lead_paragraph: Myq Kaplan, a stand-up comedian in New York, refines his material at a rate that saw one joke evolve over two months before finally making it onto late-night television.

headline.seo: Myq Kaplan Gives Birth to a Stand-Up Joke
